ItemSource.SourceLine: Function MouseDown(X As Integer, Y As Integer) As Boolean
// opens browser to MAL register page.
self.errboxshow("Melative Library was unable to log you in since you didn't enter a username.","Enter a valid username or password and try logging in again")
self.errboxshow("Melative Library was unable to log you in since you didn't enter a password.","Enter a valid password and try logging in again. ")

self.errboxshow("Melative Library was unable to log you in since you don't have the correct Username and/or Password.","Check your username and password and try logging in again. If you recently changed your password, enter your new password and try logging in.")
self.errboxshow("Melative Library was unable to log you in since it cannot connect to the server. ", "Check your internet connection and try logging in again.")
Function MouseDown(X As Integer, Y As Integer) As Boolean

Control.PropertyVal: This option allows Melative Library to store your password. When your password is stored, it's encoded so it can't be retrieved easily.
Selecting this option will make Melative Library log you in automatically without seeing the login window. Can't be enabled if Remember Password isn't selected.

Select Case b //determine which button was pressed.

self.errboxshow("Melative Library was unable to post the update.", "You cannot leave the action field blank. You must use a valid action or 'on' to post this update")

Control.PropertyVal: Sorry, this program have encountered a error and needs to close...
This program encountered a error and cannot continue. If you are in a middle of something, your work might be lost
Help us by copying the error log and posting it on the bug reports thread so it can be fixed.
